messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sweet Balance
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. Karen I finally got a new keyboard today, so I can finally use capital letters and I don t have to pound on the keys (hooray). Of course,
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. Karen
I finally got a new keyboard today, so I can finally use capital letters and
I don't have to pound on the keys (hooray). Of course, I'm so used to the
old one the typos will prob. continue for a while.
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: <HPaulson5@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 9:59 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sweet Balance


> In a message dated 7/7/00 7:28:37 AM Central Daylight Time,
> kworthen@... writes:
>
> << i ordered sweet balance 2 months ago and never got it. thanks for the
> reminder. i'll have to call or write them. i will not be ordering over
any
> more web sites that aren't secured.
> amy >>
> Amy, when I ordered it over the web, I did not get it , either. So, I
called
> their toll free #, and re-ordered. The 2nd time I ordered was over the
> phone, and I got it 10 days later. I would suggest you tell them that you
> ordered... they sent me a booklet of recipes for my inconvenience :) They
> should know something is wrong with receiving/shipping orders. They are
> based in Fla.-- St. Petersburgh, I think. ~Karen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sweet Balance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/7/00 7:28:37 AM Central Daylight Time, kworthen@mediaone.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/7/00 7:28:37 AM Central Daylight Time,
kworthen@... writes:

<< i ordered sweet balance 2 months ago and never got it. thanks for the
reminder. i'll have to call or write them. i will not be ordering over any
more web sites that aren't secured.
amy >>
Amy, when I ordered it over the web, I did not get it , either. So, I called
their toll free #, and re-ordered. The 2nd time I ordered was over the
phone, and I got it 10 days later. I would suggest you tell them that you
ordered... they sent me a booklet of recipes for my inconvenience :) They
should know something is wrong with receiving/shipping orders. They are
based in Fla.-- St. Petersburgh, I think. ~Karen
